name: FRIENDS?
description:
This game is meant to be played by a group of friends that are just trying to get to know each other, or already know one another and just want to see who knows each other better. This game can be played with 3 teams of 2, and will challenge your team to see if they actually know each other, as good as they think they do.

https://playingcards.io/x6y4rp

RuleBook = https://www.flipsnack.com/game1rules/rule-book-artg.html
